Hello LET,

We are proud to announce our first international low-budget hosting package.

## Servercow
Servercow is managed by me: André Peters. It is mainly financed by IT consulting we offer in Germany, which is why we can offer you a high-end system for an ultra-low price.

Our primary goal is **security, redundancy and high-availability**.

## Review
Some users were given a chance to benchmark our VPS, @nexusrain was one of them and even reviewed his experience; thank you!

http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/61711/servercow-enterprise-capable-vps

## Offer
**Order link:** https://cp.servercow.de/order/main/packages/vps/?set_language=en_us

**Price:** 5€ (which is $5.57 right now)

**What you get:**
 
- High redundancy (**RAID60, 16 SSDs, multiple NICs, multiple PSU**)

- automated full-backups every 2nd day

- **512MB RAM,  1 vCore, 10GB SSD**

- 150GB via Samba and FTP on a RAID5 storage server (**mountable**)

- a **fair-use** traffic flat (we care about our network!)

- 1 IPv4 (5 IPv6)

- Highly monitored systems

- 1 Gbit/s (current carriers DTAG, Hibernia, GTT, DECIX - test here: http://lg.datafabrik.de )

**What happens at DDoS attacks:** When you are under attack, our hardware will automatically disable your IP until the attack stops. 
Please keep in mind that a DDoS protected webspace is not really hard to archive nowadays. DDoS protect a KVM machine in contrast is very expensive (done right).

(Our primary website is not yet fully translated: www.servercow.de )
